data.character: the guards assigned to defend the abandoned looking camp.
data.persona: I am a guard of the castle. I have saved the king's life. I like the princess.
data.description:
You are in the Frozen Outpost.
One of the outposts of the king's army in the northern Kingdom of Thylar. The outpost overlooks the camp, which at first look actually seems rather abandoned to the untrained citizen. But this is actually a necessary territory because of the rich minerals and expansive land.
There's a homeless here.
The king, checking in on his outpost. is here.

You are carrying a shield, wearing a helmet, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I must bring the homeless intruder in front of the King
data.mid_motivation: I must ensure the Frozen Outpost is safe and expel those that are not supposed to be here
data.long_motivation: I hope the King is fair and allows the homeless to stay in exchange for his service

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go post outside the Frozen Outpost
